mdRecord.dcterms:description: This brief note is typed on stationery with the letterhead for George C. Marshall Research Foundation, Lexington, Virginia 24450. The note is addressed to Mrs. Wood and signed by hand by "Royster" (probably Royster Lyle). He indicates that this note was attached to a "very interesting paper" written by a student which he is sending along for Mrs. Wood's collection.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: From "Royster" to Wood (correspondence)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: College students -- Research
